message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it's worth the value at $95.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay a fair price for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, and I want to be fair. How about we settle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $87? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
